ygData.subject: FW: [shadowknight] Siphon Strength
ygData.msgSnippet: I am going to test this on a friend tonight will post tommorrow ... From: Mike [mailto:mikekb@vvm.com] Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 10:49 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
I am going to test this on a friend tonight will post tommorrow

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike [mailto:mikekb@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 10:49 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Siphon Strength


I did some testing on gnolls last night and I am pretty sure it helps to
keep casting siphon on them. It seems to wear off on them really quickly.
You may have noticed when fighting putrids that the weakness doesn't last
all that long. I now cast each time after I bash. The enemy does way less
damage.
